Package application

package application
  • Class
    Description
    AdminHomePage
    AdminPage class represents the user interface for the admin user.
    AdminSetupPage
    The SetupAdmin class handles the setup process for creating an administrator account.
    Answer
    Class representing an answer to a question, to pass back and forth with the database and display.
    AnswerManagementPage
    AnswerManagementPage class provides interface for viewing, creating, editing, deleting, and managing answers within the system.
    Answers
    Helper providing CRUD and search operations for Answer objects.
    AnswerValidator
    Validator for answer content used by UI forms.
    ContentFlag
    The ContentFlag class represents a flag placed on content by staff members for review.
    Feedback
    Represents feedback left by a student for a review.
    FirstPage
    FirstPage class represents the initial screen for the first user.
    FirstUserCreationTest
    Test class used during initial user/account validation checks.
    InstructorHomePage
    UI providing instructor-specific actions such as managing questions and answers.
    InvitationPage
    InvitePage class represents the page where an admin can generate an invitation code.
    NavigationHelper
    Simple navigation helper to route users to the correct home page based on role.
    PasswordEvaluator
    Utility providing password-strength checks and error details for UI validation.
    PrivateMessage
    Represents a private message between users about a question.
    Question
    Class representing a question for display and passing to and from the database.
    QuestionManagementPage
     
    Questions
    Helper providing CRUD and search operations for Question objects.
    QuestionValidator
     
    Review
    Represents a review made by a reviewer on an answer.
    ReviewerApprovalPage
    Page for instructors to approve or deny pending reviewer role requests.
    ReviewerFeatureTests
    Tests covering the student-facing reviewer features implemented: - Sending private feedback to a reviewer (stored as PrivateMessage) - Adding a reviewer to the student's trusted reviewers list (in-memory User list) - Searching reviewers (via DatabaseHelper.getAllReviewerProfiles + simple filtering)
    ReviewerHomePage
    UI providing reviewer-specific actions such as viewing feedback and profiles.
    ReviewerProfile
    Represents a reviewer profile
    ReviewerProfilePage
    Represents a user interface page displaying a reviewer's profile
    ReviewerProfilePage.AccessContext
     
    ReviewerProfilesPage
    Represents a user interface page displaying all reviewer profiles
    ReviewerReviewPage
    UI page where reviewers can view answers and submit reviews for selected answers.
    ReviewManagementPage
    ReviewManagementPage handles the user interface for reviewers to manage their own reviews.
    RoleSelectionPage
     
    SetupAccountLogic
     
    SetupAccountPage
    SetupAccountPage class handles the account setup process for new users.
    SetupLoginSelectionPage
    The SetupLoginSelectionPage class allows users to choose between setting up a new account or logging into an existing account.
    StaffContentViewPage
    The StaffContentViewPage class provides a comprehensive interface for staff members to view all content in the system.
    StaffFlaggedContentPage
    The StaffFlaggedContentPage class provides an interface for staff members to view and manage content that has been flagged as inappropriate or concerning.
    StaffHomePage
    The StaffHomePage class serves as the main navigation hub for staff members.
    StaffReportPage
    The StaffReportPage class provides comprehensive reporting and analytics functionality for staff members to monitor system health and user activity.
    StartCSE360
     
    StudentHomePage
     
    TempPasswordPage
    TempPasswordPage allows admin to set a one-time password for a user who forgot theirs.
    TestCases
    TestCases contains unit and integration tests for database operations within the CSE360 application.
    User
    The User class represents a user entity in the system.
    UserHomePage
    This page displays a simple welcome message for the user.
    UserLoginPage
    The UserLoginPage class provides a login interface for users to access their accounts.
    UserMessagePage
    UserMessagePage - Lists recent questions - Students can send a private message to the question author about a question - Question authors see unread counts and can open/read/reply to private message threads
    UserNameRecognizer
     
    WelcomeLoginPage
    The WelcomeLoginPage class displays a welcome screen for authenticated users.
